00027    * Constructor.

00029    MdPairPotential::MdPairPotential(System& system)
00030     : ParamComposite(),
00031       SubSystem(system)

00040    /* 
00041    * Build the PairList.
00042    */ 
00043    void MdPairPotential::buildPairList() 
00044    {
00045 
00046       // Recalculate the grid for the internal CellList
00047       pairList_.makeGrid(boundary());
00048 
00049       // Clear all atoms from the internal CellList
00050       pairList_.clear();
00051 
00052       // Add every atom in this System to the CellList
00053       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00054       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00055       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00056          for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00057             molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00058             for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00059                #ifdef MCMD_SHIFT
00060                boundary().shift(atomIter->position(), atomIter->shift());
00061                #else
00062                boundary().shift(atomIter->position());
00063                #endif
00064                pairList_.addAtom(*atomIter);
00065             }
00066          }
00067       }
00068 
00069       // Use the completed CellList to build the PairList 
00070       pairList_.build(boundary());
00071    }
00072 
00073    /* 
00074    * Clear the PairList statistical accumulators
00075    */ 
00076    void MdPairPotential::clearPairListStatistics() 
00077    {  pairList_.clearStatistics(); }
00078 
00079    /* 
00080    * Return true if the pair list is current, false if it is obsolete.
00081    */
00082    bool MdPairPotential::isPairListCurrent() 
00083    { return pairList_.isCurrent(boundary()); }
00084 
00085 }
00086 #endif
